price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߕߐ߰ߡߊ߬ߛߙߋ ߘߏ߫ ߕߏ߫ ߦߋ߲߬ ߖߊ߲߰ߞߕߊ߬ ߘߌߡߌ߲ߣߍ߲ ߢߍߛߌߟߊ߲ߢߍߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫
arabic: وَتَرَكۡنَا فِيهَآ ءَايَةٗ لِّلَّذِينَ يَخَافُونَ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wataraknā fīhā āyatan lilladhīna yakhāfūna al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
